properties.Observatio: Although the anicut is in good condition, its wing walls are destroyed and the timber planks are missing. It is reported that this anicut feeds feeds about 20 acres of paddy fields.
properties.Descriptio:
Scarifying existing rock or concrete surface

Supplying and fixing M.S. dowels spliced and dovetailed with wedge at one end 16mm dia. And 600mm long, boring holes to 0.3m depth in fixing

Construction of 2.0m high 1:3:6 (40mm) cement concrete Retaining W

properties.Observatio: The total length of the canal is 750m. Some sections of this canal  have been developed (W=0.45m, H=0.6m). 15 Acres of paddy is cultivated from this canal.
properties.Descriptio:
Vegetative cover improving for narrow strips (1.5m-2.0m wide) with Arecanut seedlings at 1.5m spacing in 2 rows, Betel plants VP at 3m spacing in 1 row, Green gram as a cover crop

Miscellaneous

Contingencies 10%

properties.Observatio: Although the anicut is in good condition, the connection between gate and tred bar is broken. The pitapela canal begins here.
properties.Descriptio:
Supplying & installing a suitable CI rod for the gate

Miscellaneous
